channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bin collection Scawfell Street, 6th September
item.description:
The bin collection is once every two weeks and I keep getting maggots in my bin. This is completely unacceptable all of that live in the new build houses on Scawfell street have kids and accumulate a lot of rubbish because of this. Now there is maggots
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Scawfell Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Work Being Carried Out, 6th September
item.description:
